answer:
By breastfeeding, you may pass some antibodies you have made in response to the MMR vaccine to your child.  These antibodies may provide some protection, but this protection is limited and short-term and is not enough to protect a child from infection with measles, mumps or rubella.
	The best protection against these diseases is vaccination. If your child is too young to get the measles, mumps, rubella (MMR) vaccine, the best way to protect your child is to ensure everyone around your child is vaccinated (close contacts, care providers etc).  If you live in a community where there is currently a measles outbreak and would like more information on how to protect your child, we encourage you to contact your local public health unit and ask to speak with a public health nurse. You can find the contact information for your local public health unit here: http://immunizebc.ca/finder.
answer_formatted:
## By breastfeeding, you may pass some antibodies you have made in response to the MMR vaccine to your child.

These antibodies may provide some protection, but this protection is limited and short-term and is not enough to protect a child from infection with measles, mumps or rubella.

## The best protection against these diseases is vaccination.

If your child is too young to get the measles, mumps, rubella (MMR) vaccine, the best way to protect your child is to ensure everyone around your child is vaccinated (close contacts, care providers etc).

## If you live in a community where there is currently a measles outbreak and would like more information on how to protect your child, we encourage you to contact your local public health unit and ask to speak with a public health nurse.

You can find the contact information for your local public health unit here:http://immunizebc.
ca/finder.
question: As a nursing mother who has been immunized for MMR, do I pass antibodies on to my child through breast milk?
question_variation_0: do you pass antibodies on through breastmilk?
question_variation_1: how can an immunization pass antibodies on
question_variation_2: can immunizations go through breast milk
